Dan Vitale 19 Yd pass from Clayton Thorson (Jack Mitchell Kick)

videos.headline: W. Lunt run for 1 yd for a TD, (T. Zalewski KICK)
videos.description: Wes Lunt run for 1 yd for a TD (Taylor Zalewski KICK)

videos.headline: Vitale makes juggling TD catch for Northwestern
videos.description: Northwestern's Dan Vitale bats the ball into the air with one hand, and then uses both hands to make the catch and scoot 19 yards into the end zone.

videos.headline: W. Long run for 3 yds for a TD, (J. Mitchell KICK)
videos.description: Warren Long run for 3 yds for a TD (Jack Mitchell KICK)

videos.headline: Tipped pass leads to Illinois interception and 54-yard return TD
videos.description: Clayton Thorson's pass is tipped at the line of scrimmage and falls to Mason Monheim, who goes 54 yards the other way for the defensive touchdown.
